name: Layerswap
description:
Layerswap is the ultimate L2 gateway - offering instant and gasless on and off-ramp transactions to L2s.
You can use Layerswap to instantly transfer ETH, USDC, and other tokens from a centralized exchange like Coinbase, Binance, FTX.COM, Kraken, and others to all major L2s, including StarkNet, zkSync, Loopring, ImmutableX, Arbitrum, and Optimism.
